resources.string: Choose some food and we will see wheter it is heart-healthy or not!
Hi! I am Core and I know EVERYTHING about nutrition!
Careful! That food can be unhealthy if you abuse it. I suggest moderation!.
Oh, no! That food is not heart-healthy... too bad... I loved it...
There is no such thing as a healthy amount of booze, I am afraid!
Very healthy and nutritious! Learn to properly cook them!
Eggs are very nutritious! Do not worry about your chollesterol, that was a myth!
A must in every diet! Dont forget about them!
Dairies can be healthy, but some of them should be avoided!
Fruits are easy to judge! Just eat as much as you want!
Great! That food is perfectly heart-healthy!
Tricky, always go for the wholegrain variants!
Touch the icon for more info
An unmatched source of proteins and energy!
Select one element from the list
